content: *hang this useful organizer from a door knob to keep all kinds of small items handy measures approx 5 x 10 12 5 x 25 5 cm shown in patons classic wool #207 rich red using 5 mm u s h or 8 crochet hook patons yarns * skill level beginner materials patons® classic wool 100 g / 3 5 oz #00207 rich red 1 ball size 5 mm u s h or 8 crochet hook or size needed to obtain gauge
